LegalDocument.name: OFPRA Form
LegalDocument.description: Official form for asylum applications in France, submitted to OFPRA.

LegalDocument.name: Asylum Application Certificate (ATDA)
LegalDocument.description: Certificate provided to asylum seekers proving their application status.

LegalDocument.name: Residence Permit
LegalDocument.description: Legal document authorizing a foreign national to reside in France.

LegalDocument.name: Temporary Residence Permit
LegalDocument.description: Permit allowing temporary stay in France, typically for a specified purpose like study or work.

LegalDocument.name: Work Permit
LegalDocument.description: Authorization for asylum seekers or foreign nationals to work in France.

LegalDocument.name: Passport
LegalDocument.description: National identification document for international travel.

LegalDocument.name: Identity Card
LegalDocument.description: Official identification document issued to residents, verifying identity within the country.

LegalDocument.name: Student Visa
LegalDocument.description: Visa allowing foreign nationals to study in France, with potential for conversion to a residence permit.

LegalDocument.name: Dublin Transfer Decision
LegalDocument.description: Document issued under the Dublin Regulation, deciding the responsible country for an asylum claim.

LegalDocument.name: Reception Certificate
LegalDocument.description: Certificate confirming the reception of an asylum application by French authorities.

LegalDocument.name: Prefecture Appointment Letter
LegalDocument.description: Document issued by the Prefecture to schedule appointments for processing various immigration-related requests.

LegalDocument.name: OFPRA Decision Letter
LegalDocument.description: Official communication from OFPRA regarding the outcome of an asylum application.

LegalDocument.name: CNDA Appeal Certificate
LegalDocument.description: Document confirming the submission of an appeal to the National Court of Asylum (CNDA).

LegalDocument.name: OQTF Notice
LegalDocument.description: Obligation to Leave French Territory (OQTF) notice issued to foreign nationals whose stay is no longer authorized.

LegalDocument.name: Renewal Receipt
LegalDocument.description: Receipt issued upon the renewal of asylum or residence documents.

LegalDocument.name: Travel Document for Refugees
LegalDocument.description: Document issued to refugees, allowing them to travel internationally.

LegalDocument.name: Attestation of Domiciliation
LegalDocument.description: Proof of address document required for various administrative procedures in France.

LegalDocument.name: Family Reunification Application
LegalDocument.description: Application for bringing family members of a refugee or resident to France.

LegalDocument.name: OFPRA Notification Letter
LegalDocument.description: Letter from OFPRA notifying an asylum seeker of important decisions or requests for additional information.

LegalDocument.name: ADA Receipt
LegalDocument.description: Receipt confirming eligibility for the Asylum Seekers Allowance (ADA).

LegalDocument.name: Passport Talent Application
LegalDocument.description: Application for a long-term visa or residence permit under the French 'Passeport Talent' scheme for skilled workers.

LegalDocument.name: Dublin Procedure Notice
LegalDocument.description: Notice informing an asylum seeker that their application will be processed under the Dublin Regulation.

LegalDocument.name: DCEM Application
LegalDocument.description: Application for the 'Document de Circulation pour Ã‰tranger Mineur' (DCEM), allowing minors to travel abroad.

LegalDocument.name: Prefecture RDV Receipt
LegalDocument.description: Receipt confirming a scheduled appointment with the Prefecture for processing documents.

LegalDocument.name: Prefecture Registration Letter
LegalDocument.description: Letter confirming registration of an asylum application at the Prefecture.

LegalDocument.name: CNDA Hearing Notice
LegalDocument.description: Notice of a scheduled hearing at the National Court of Asylum (CNDA) for an appeal.

LegalDocument.name: Expulsion Order
LegalDocument.description: Legal order mandating the removal of an individual from French territory.

LegalDocument.name: Passeport Talent Document
LegalDocument.description: Document issued under the 'Passeport Talent' program for highly skilled workers.

LegalDocument.name: Refugee Status Grant Letter
LegalDocument.description: Letter from OFPRA confirming the grant of refugee status.

LegalDocument.name: Asylum Story Document
LegalDocument.description: Personal narrative document submitted as part of the asylum application, detailing reasons for seeking asylum.

LegalDocument.name: Work Permit Application
LegalDocument.description: Application submitted by an asylum seeker or foreign national to obtain a work permit.

LegalDocument.name: Renewal Application
LegalDocument.description: Application for the renewal of residence or asylum-related documents.

LegalDocument.name: CNDA Decision Letter
LegalDocument.description: Official communication from the CNDA regarding the outcome of an asylum appeal.
